content.text:
Expanso isn't installed on your system. Here are the installation options:

**Install via Cargo (Rust):**
```bash
cargo install espanso
```

**Install via package manager (Fedora):**
```bash
sudo dnf install espanso
```

**Or download from releases:**
```bash
wget https://github.com/espanso/espanso/releases/latest/download/espanso-debian-x86_64.tar.gz
tar -xzf espanso-debian-x86_64.tar.gz
sudo mv espanso /usr/local/bin/
```

After installation, you'll need to:
1. Register the service: `espanso service register`
2. Start it: `espanso start`

content.text:
You need to install the X11 development packages first. Run this in your terminal:

```bash
sudo dnf install libX11-devel libXtst-devel libXi-devel libxkbcommon-devel wayland-devel
```

Then retry the Cargo installation:

```bash
cargo install --git https://github.com/espanso/espanso
```

After successful installation, set it up with:
```bash
espanso service register
espanso start
```

content.text:
Now it's missing wxWidgets. You need to install that as well:

```bash
sudo dnf install wxGTK-devel
```

Then retry the installation:
```bash
cargo install --git https://github.com/espanso/espanso
```

Alternatively, you could try downloading a pre-built binary instead:

```bash
wget https://github.com/espanso/espanso/releases/download/v2.2.1/espanso-debian-x11-amd64.tar.gz
tar -xzf espanso-debian-x11-amd64.tar.gz
sudo mv espanso /usr/local/bin/
```

The pre-built binary might be easier than dealing with all the build dependencies.

Hey! long time no see huh?

I could sign a macOS silicon (M-arch) package and i went a step further and created a `.dmg` image.

Windows is not signed, because we weren't able to make it. Apologies for the inconvenience.

macOS Intel is missing, I know, I'm figuring out how to sign it with my M-arch mac so you can have it signed 👌🏼 .

Have fun and report any issues!

Hey! long time no see huh?

I could sign a macOS silicon (M-arch) package and i went a step further and created a `.dmg` image.

Windows is not signed, because we weren't able to make it. Apologies for the inconvenience.

macOS Intel is missing, I know, I'm figuring out how to sign it with my M-arch mac so you can have it signed 👌🏼 .

Have fun and report any issues!

- ♻️ upgrade some dependencies and remove other unused ones by [@AucaCoyan](https://github.com/AucaCoyan) in [#2188](https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2188)
- Removed CI workaround and fixed compilation on macOS ARM by [@jpalharini](https://github.com/jpalharini) in [#2196](https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2196)
- 📝 improve contributing documentation by [@AucaCoyan](https://github.com/AucaCoyan) in [#2104](https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2104)
- 🩹 fix route of the Compilation doc by [@AucaCoyan](https://github.com/AucaCoyan) in [#2200](https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2200)
- 🔧 setup rust-toolchain by [@AucaCoyan](https://github.com/AucaCoyan) in [#2202](https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2202)
- 💚 missing ignore for the pull requests and some typos in the docs by [@AucaCoyan](https://github.com/AucaCoyan) in [#2203](https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2203)
- 📝 move a lot of docs into the `docs/` folder by [@AucaCoyan](https://github.com/AucaCoyan) in [#2208](https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2208)
- ⬆️ upgrade `linked-hash-map` by [@AucaCoyan](https://github.com/AucaCoyan) in [#2210](https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2210)
- 🐛 Fix/prevent sync tool stealing focus by [@AucaCoyan](https://github.com/AucaCoyan) in [#2212](https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2212)
- 🐛 Fix unable to start espanso by [@AucaCoyan](https://github.com/AucaCoyan) in [#2220](https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2220)
- ✨ use `toml` instead of plaintext by [@AucaCoyan](https://github.com/AucaCoyan) in [#2244](https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2244)
- remove 2048 byte clipboard limit for macOS by [@woerndl](https://github.com/woerndl) in [#2089](https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2089)
- 🔖 make the release v2.2.3-beta by [@AucaCoyan](https://github.com/AucaCoyan) in [#2267](https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2267)
- ⬆️ chore(deps): bump openssl from 0.10.66 to 0.10.71 by [@dependabot](https://github.com/dependabot) in [#2268](https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2268)

  "body": "Automatically released by CI and manually updated by @AucaCoyan \r\n\r\nHey! long time no see huh?\r\nI could sign a macOS silicon (M-arch) package and i went a step further and created a `.dmg` image.\r\nWindows is not signed, because we weren't able to make it. Apologies for the inconvenience.\r\n\r\nmacOS Intel is missing, I know, I'm figuring out how to sign it with my M-arch mac so you can have it signed 👌🏼 .\r\n\r\nHave fun and report any issues!\r\n\r\n## What's Changed\r\n* :rotating_light: fix: clippy warnings by @federico-terzi in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1809\r\n* :sparkles: feat(clipboard): add representation for type NSHTMLPboardType in NSPasteboard  by @mmetesreau in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1807\r\n* :arrow_up: Upgrade `enum-as-inner` across crates by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1796\r\n* :sparkles: feat(render): add support for pwsh by @phorcys420 in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1824\r\n* :memo: Update SECURITY.md by @smeech in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1836\r\n* :green_heart:  update `Swatinem/rust-cache@v1` for `v2` by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1830\r\n* :arrow_up: upgrade `fs_extra` and `html2text` by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1831\r\n* :arrow_up: Upgrade `cargo-make` to version `0.37.5` by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1797\r\n* :arrow_up: chore(deps): bump h2 from 0.3.18 to 0.3.24 by @dependabot in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1815\r\n* :memo: Add contributing doc and upgrade `workspace.resolver` to v2 by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1829\r\n* :building_construction: fix cargo-make release builds by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1846\r\n* :arrow_up: chore(deps): bump tokio from 1.19.2 to 1.28.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1844\r\n* :rotating_light: fix clippy in `dev` branch by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1852\r\n* :arrow_up: chore(deps): bump bzip2 from 0.4.3 to 0.4.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1501\r\n* :fire: remove unused crates by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1856\r\n* :bug: fix `=` issue in build_windows_resources by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1877\r\n* Add option to open config folder to context menu by @BNolet in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1870\r\n* ✨ Combine `Compilation` with `CONTRIBUTING` and extend the details by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1864\r\n* Revert  mistake at \"Combine `Compilation` with `CONTRIBUTING` and extend the details\" by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1883\r\n* ✨ Use new sctk api by @morgan-dgk in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1901\r\n* :rotating_light: fix clippy by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1921\r\n* :green_heart: change Dockerfile by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1923\r\n* :bug: Fix build with wx-config-qt by @astehlik in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1918\r\n* :arrow_up: chore(deps): bump h2 from 0.3.24 to 0.3.26 by @dependabot in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1930\r\n* :memo: change feature request template by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1936\r\n* :memo: chore: add github issue form bug and feat templates by @tobiasbueschel in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1042\r\n* :bug: Add return value to fix runtime crash on nix + aarch64-darwin by @n8henrie in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1946\r\n* :sparkles: add schemas by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1917\r\n* :arrow_up: upgrade `upload-artifact` to `v4` by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1951\r\n* :bug: fix links in yaml schemas by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1952\r\n* :sparkles: add `nushell` support by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1924\r\n* :sparkles: feat: add devcontainer by @phorcys420 in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1861\r\n* :recycle: refactor: Use workspace dependencies where practical by @n8henrie in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1956\r\n* Update to latest clippy by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1962\r\n* fix(inject): attach modifiers state to the next record on x11 by @bew in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1680\r\n* Support non-ASCII characters in triggers on macOS by @mthies-unibi in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1967\r\n* :rotating_light: fix clippy by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1988\r\n* Word separators by @smeech in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1989\r\n* :green_heart: change `macos-11` for `macos-latest` by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1987\r\n* Improve form size constraints and text overflow behavior by @mainete in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1991\r\n* :rotating_light: fix clippy warnings and tests by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2002\r\n* Show regex in search bar by @mainete in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1998\r\n* Create a rpm build automatically by @bekoeppel in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1979\r\n* :green_heart: fix requirement `create-release` by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2004\r\n* :green_heart: remove `rpm` build by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2008\r\n* :construction: fix some allow lints by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2003\r\n* :sparkles: try again with clap 3.0 by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2009\r\n* :memo: clarify `Applications` folder by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2015\r\n* :fire: remove `snap` support by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2016\r\n* :arrow_up: upgrade `bumpalo` by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2017\r\n* :arrow_up: upgrade `colored` by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2018\r\n* :construction_worker: change ubuntu 18.04 for 24.04 in the docker image by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1925\r\n* :green_heart: fix path of the ci by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2025\r\n* :arrow_up: chore(deps): bump openssl from 0.10.61 to 0.10.66 by @dependabot in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2026\r\n* :sparkles: add `locale` and `offset` to date module schema by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2040\r\n* :memo: docs: fix code fences by @MRDGH2821 in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2055\r\n* :rotating_light: Fix clippy by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2065\r\n* Resolve issue with cursor placement when using multi-byte characters by @ndit-dev in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2063\r\n* :bug: Fix delay between keystrokes on Mac. by @0x3333 in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2067\r\n* remove 2048 byte clipboard limit for windows by @kpym in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2085\r\n* :bug: fix label needs triage by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2093\r\n* ⚗️ add support to detect wayland compositor in use by @morgan-dgk in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2101\r\n* :loud_sound: update level of   "body": "Automatically released by CI and manually updated by @AucaCoyan \r\n\r\nHey! long time no see huh?\r\nI could sign a macOS silicon (M-arch) package and i went a step further and created a `.dmg` image.\r\nWindows is not signed, because we weren't able to make it. Apologies for the inconvenience.\r\n\r\nmacOS Intel is missing, I know, I'm figuring out how to sign it with my M-arch mac so you can have it signed 👌🏼 .\r\n\r\nHave fun and report any issues!\r\n\r\n## What's Changed\r\n* :rotating_light: fix: clippy warnings by @federico-terzi in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1809\r\n* :sparkles: feat(clipboard): add representation for type NSHTMLPboardType in NSPasteboard  by @mmetesreau in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1807\r\n* :arrow_up: Upgrade `enum-as-inner` across crates by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1796\r\n* :sparkles: feat(render): add support for pwsh by @phorcys420 in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1824\r\n* :memo: Update SECURITY.md by @smeech in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1836\r\n* :green_heart:  update `Swatinem/rust-cache@v1` for `v2` by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1830\r\n* :arrow_up: upgrade `fs_extra` and `html2text` by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1831\r\n* :arrow_up: Upgrade `cargo-make` to version `0.37.5` by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1797\r\n* :arrow_up: chore(deps): bump h2 from 0.3.18 to 0.3.24 by @dependabot in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1815\r\n* :memo: Add contributing doc and upgrade `workspace.resolver` to v2 by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1829\r\n* :building_construction: fix cargo-make release builds by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1846\r\n* :arrow_up: chore(deps): bump tokio from 1.19.2 to 1.28.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1844\r\n* :rotating_light: fix clippy in `dev` branch by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1852\r\n* :arrow_up: chore(deps): bump bzip2 from 0.4.3 to 0.4.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1501\r\n* :fire: remove unused crates by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1856\r\n* :bug: fix `=` issue in build_windows_resources by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1877\r\n* Add option to open config folder to context menu by @BNolet in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1870\r\n* ✨ Combine `Compilation` with `CONTRIBUTING` and extend the details by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1864\r\n* Revert  mistake at \"Combine `Compilation` with `CONTRIBUTING` and extend the details\" by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1883\r\n* ✨ Use new sctk api by @morgan-dgk in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1901\r\n* :rotating_light: fix clippy by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1921\r\n* :green_heart: change Dockerfile by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1923\r\n* :bug: Fix build with wx-config-qt by @astehlik in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1918\r\n* :arrow_up: chore(deps): bump h2 from 0.3.24 to 0.3.26 by @dependabot in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1930\r\n* :memo: change feature request template by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1936\r\n* :memo: chore: add github issue form bug and feat templates by @tobiasbueschel in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1042\r\n* :bug: Add return value to fix runtime crash on nix + aarch64-darwin by @n8henrie in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1946\r\n* :sparkles: add schemas by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1917\r\n* :arrow_up: upgrade `upload-artifact` to `v4` by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1951\r\n* :bug: fix links in yaml schemas by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1952\r\n* :sparkles: add `nushell` support by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1924\r\n* :sparkles: feat: add devcontainer by @phorcys420 in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1861\r\n* :recycle: refactor: Use workspace dependencies where practical by @n8henrie in x11 by @bew in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1680\r\n* Support non-ASCII characters in triggers on macOS by @mthies-unibi in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1967\r\n* :rotating_light: fix clippy by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1988\r\n* Word separators by @smeech in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1989\r\n* :green_heart: change https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1991\r\n* :rotating_light: fix clippy warnings and tests by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2002\r\n* Show regex in search bar by @mainete upgrade `bumpalo` by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2017\r\n* :arrow_up: upgrade `colored` by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2018\r\n* :construction_worker: change ubuntu 18.04 for 24.04 in the docker image by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/1925\r\n* :green_heart: fix path of the ci by @AucaCoyan in `locale` and `offset` to date module schema by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2040\r\n* :memo: docs: fix code fences by @MRDGH2821 in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2055\r\n* :rotating_light: Fix clippy by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2065\r\n* Resolve issue with cursor placement when using multi-byte characters by @ndit-dev in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2063\r\n* :bug: Fix delay between keystrokes on Mac. by @0x3333 in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2067\r\n* https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2093\r\n* ⚗️ add support to detect wayland compositor in use by @morgan-dgk in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2101\r\n* :loud_sound: update level of very verbose wayland log by @AucaCoyan in https://github.com/espanso/espanso/pull/2107\r\n* :label: update labels of feature request issues by @AucaCoyan in content.text:
Perfect! The service is:
- **Loaded** and **enabled** - this means it will start automatically at login
- **Active (running)** - currently working

The service is already configured to start automatically when you log in. You can verify this works by:

1. **Restarting your computer** - Espanso should start automatically
2. **Or logging out and back in** - it should also start then

If you ever need to manually control it:
```bash
# Stop espanso
espanso stop

# Start espanso  
espanso start

# Restart espanso
espanso restart

# Check if running
espanso status
```

The auto-startup is already configured and working!

# espanso configuration file

# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/espanso/espanso/dev/schemas/config.schema.json

# For a complete introduction, visit the official docs at: https://espanso.org/docs/

# You can use this file to define the global configuration options for espanso.
# These are the parameters that will be used by default on every application,
# but you can also override them on a per-application basis.

# To make customization easier, this file contains some of the commonly used
# parameters. Feel free to uncomment and tune them to fit your needs!

# --- Toggle key

# Customize the key used to disable and enable espanso (when double tapped)
# Available options: CTRL, SHIFT, ALT, CMD, OFF
# You can also specify the key variant, such as LEFT_CTRL, RIGHT_SHIFT, etc...
toggle_key: LEFT_SHIFT
# You can also disable the toggle key completely with
# toggle_key: RIGHT_SHIFT

# --- Injection Backend

# Espanso supports multiple ways of injecting text into applications. Each of
# them has its quirks, therefore you may want to change it if you are having problems.
# By default, espanso uses the "Auto" backend which should work well in most cases,
# but you may want to try the "Clipboard" or "Inject" backend in case of issues.
backend: Clipboard

# --- Auto-restart

# Enable/disable the config auto-reload after a file change is detected.
# auto_restart: false

# --- Clipboard threshold

# Because injecting long texts char-by-char is a slow operation, espanso automatically
# uses the clipboard if the text is longer than 'clipboard_threshold' characters.
# clipboard_threshold: 100

# For a list of all the available options, visit the official docs at: https://espanso.org/docs/

file.content:
# espanso match file

# For a complete introduction, visit the official docs at: https://espanso.org/docs/

# You can use this file to define the base matches (aka snippets)
# that will be available in every application when using espanso.

# Matches are substitution rules: when you type the "trigger" string
# it gets replaced by the "replace" string.

# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/espanso/espanso/dev/schemas/match.schema.json

matches:
  # Simple text replacement
  - trigger: ":espanso"
    replace: "Hi there!"

  # NOTE: espanso uses YAML to define matches, so pay attention to the indentation!

  # But matches can also be dynamic:

  # Print the current date
  - trigger: ":d"
    replace: "{{mydate}}"
    vars:
      - name: mydate
        type: date
        params:
          format: "%Y-%m-%d"

  # Print the output of a shell command
  - trigger: ":shell"
    replace: "{{output}}"
    vars:
      - name: output
        type: shell
        params:
          cmd: "echo 'Hello from your shell'"
  
  - trigger: ":time"
    replace: "{{current_time}}"
    vars:
      - name: current_time
        type: shell
        params: 
          cmd: "date +%H:%M:%S"
  - trigger: ":u"
    replace: "skamenan"
  # Simple text expansion
  - trigger: "w@"
    replace: "skamenan@redhat.com"
  
  # Alternative email trigger
  - trigger: ":e"
    replace: "skamenan@redhat.com"

  # And much more! For more information, visit the docs: https://espanso.org/docs/

message.content: can you logout. my company asked me to use corporate account. i want to switch to that accountinstead. https://source.redhat.com/departments/it/itx/document_management_and_collaboration/claude_code

content.text:
I can't log you out directly from within Claude Code, but I can help you understand how to switch to your corporate account.

To switch accounts in Claude Code, you'll need to:

1. **Exit Claude Code** (Ctrl+C or close the terminal)
2. **Log out from the current session**:
   ```bash
   claude auth logout
   ```
3. **Log in with your corporate account**:
   ```bash
   claude auth login
   ```

This will open a browser where you can authenticate with your Red Hat corporate account instead of your personal one.

Your Espanso installation will remain intact and working regardless of which Claude Code account you use - it's installed locally on your system.
